plays.text: Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Crosschecking Marty Reasoner
Goal scored by Ryan Smyth assisted by Mike Comrie and Jason Smith
Penalty to Todd Marchant 2 minutes for Roughing Stephane Quintal served by Todd Marchant
Penalty to Karl Dykhuis 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified) served by Karl Dykhuis
Penalty to Janne Niinimaa 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified) served by Janne Niinimaa
Goal scored by Janne Niinimaa assisted by Eric Brewer
Goal scored by Dan Cleary assisted by Jochen Hecht and Janne Niinimaa
Goal scored by Brian Savage assisted by Yanic Perreault and Chad Kilger
Penalty to Sean Brown 2 minutes for Elbowing Andreas Dackell served by Sean Brown
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Roughing Martin Rucinsky served by Steve Staios
